readingKunHtml: <primary>あき</primary>, おろか, ほけ, ぼ
sourceMeaningMnemonic: You see a <radical>mouth</radical> coming out of the top of a <radical>tree</radical> so you go into <kanji>shock</kanji>. Your brain just can't comprehend what's in front of you.
meaningInfo: A tree... with... a... mouth? No, it can't be... I... a-. Your face warps into a permanent state of shock.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>shock</kanji> you've suffered results in you needing to stay <reading>ho</reading>me (<ja>ほう</ja>) from now on. You don't get to travel, explore, or even get groceries. You're homebound from now on, buddy.
readingInfo: I'd be shocked if you ever left your home again, honestly. But hey, there's always anime.
